moduleDescription: Standard practices, structural repairs and related systems for the AME Structures (S) licence.

sets.name: 01 – Standard Practices (Structures)
sets.subtitle: Standard practices specific to the Structures licence.

sets.name: 02 – Aerodynamics & Structural Loads
sets.subtitle: Basic aerodynamics for structures and structural load paths.

sets.name: 03 – Math & Physics (Structures)
sets.subtitle: Math and physics topics applied to structural work.

sets.name: 04 – Hardware & Materials
sets.subtitle: Fasteners, materials and structural hardware selection.

sets.name: 05 – Drawings & Structural Diagrams
sets.subtitle: Reading structural drawings, repair schemes and diagrams.

sets.name: 06 – Weight & Balance (Structures)
sets.subtitle: Weight & balance considerations for structural repairs.

sets.name: 07 – Corrosion & Metallurgy
sets.subtitle: Corrosion mechanisms, metallurgy basics and treatments.

sets.name: 08 – NDT (Standard Practices)
sets.subtitle: Non-destructive testing techniques used in structures.

sets.name: 09 – Servicing & General Practices
sets.subtitle: Servicing and general maintenance practices for structures.

sets.name: 10 – Tools & Measuring Devices
sets.subtitle: Hand tools, special tools and measuring devices for structural work.

sets.name: 11 – Basic Structural Concepts
sets.subtitle: Basic structural members, load paths and repair zones.

sets.name: 12 – Maintenance Procedures
sets.subtitle: Structural maintenance procedures, approvals and paperwork.

sets.name: 13 – Sheet Metal Structures
sets.subtitle: Sheet metal construction, repairs and best practices.

sets.name: 14 – Tubular Structures
sets.subtitle: Tubular structures, welding and repair considerations.

sets.name: 15 – Wood & Fabric Structures
sets.subtitle: Wood and fabric structural construction and repair.

sets.name: 16 – Composite Structures
sets.subtitle: Composite structural repairs, materials and safety.

sets.name: 17 – Corrosion (Systems)
sets.subtitle: Corrosion specific to structural systems and repairs.

sets.name: 18 – NDT (Structures Systems)
sets.subtitle: Application of NDT methods to structural systems.

sets.name: 19 – Fluid Lines & Fittings
sets.subtitle: Fluid lines, fittings and routing in structural areas.

sets.name: 20 – Thermoplastics & Transparencies
sets.subtitle: Thermoplastic materials, transparencies and repair methods.
